definition: Great Bear/Big Dipper/Peitou town in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
abbr. for the Big Dipper constellation 北斗星[Bei3 dou3 xing1]
to fight/to struggle/to condemn/to censure/to contend/to put together/coming together
dry measure for grain equal to ten 升[sheng1] or one-tenth of a 石[dan4]/decaliter/peck/cup or dipper shaped object/old variant of 陡[dou3]
lit. Mount Tai and the North Star (idiom)/fig. an outstanding figure in one's field
BeiDou Navigation Satellite System (BDS) (similar to GPS)
pinyin: Bei3 Dou3 Wei4 xing1 Dao3 hang2 Xi4 tong3

definition: Peitou town in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
the Winnowing Basket in the southern sky, and the Big Dipper in the north (idiom); sth which, despite its name, is of no practical use

sentences.english: China to launch fifth orbiter for its own 'GPS' .
sentences.chinese: 我国近日将择机发射第五颗北斗导航卫星。

sentences.english: We can see neither Altair or Ursa Major in the cloudy night sky.
sentences.chinese: 阴天的夜空既看不到牛郎星，也看不到北斗星。

sentences.english: During the day, it stopped to have a rest.
sentences.chinese: 白天，当它看不清北斗星的时候，它就停下来休息。

sentences.english: Many bright stars make the big Dipper.
sentences.chinese: 许多明亮的星星，形成北斗星。

sentences.english: Through courses of the sea rolling.
sentences.chinese: 船只循著北斗星探索起伏的海洋。

sentences.english: That's why these two stars, Dubhe and Merak, are known as "The Pointers."
sentences.chinese: 这也是为什么天枢星和北斗二星被称作指极星。

sentences.english: Lonely, home is dark, the big dipper oasis in the desert.
sentences.chinese: 孤独时，家是黑夜里的北斗，是沙漠中的绿洲。

sentences.english: Which maketh Arcturus, Orion, and Pleiades, and the chambers of the south.
sentences.chinese: 他造北斗，叁星，昴星，并南方的密宫。

sentences.english: The Big Dipper actually belongs to the constellation Ursa Major, otherwise known as the Big Bear.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，北斗七星归属大熊星座，或成为大熊。

sentences.english: The Big Dipper pops out into your northwestern sky on August evenings.
sentences.chinese: 在八月的夜晚北斗星将移动至天空的西北方向。

sentences.english: On a fine summer night travellers can go by the Dipper.
sentences.chinese: 夏天晴夜，旅行的人可根据北斗星辨明方向。

sentences.english: The natural objects belief of Confucius mansion mainly involved sacrificing the Big Dipper and sundial.
sentences.chinese: 孔府的自然物信仰主要包括祭北斗和祭日晷。

sentences.english: It marks the establishment of a basic system for the navigation and positioning network.
sentences.chinese: 它标志着北斗区域卫星导航定位的基本系统建设完成。

sentences.english: In ancient times, the Big Dipper was hidden by a monster suddenly.
sentences.chinese: 上古时代，天上的北斗七星突然被怪物藏匿起来。

sentences.english: Can you see the great dipper ?
Early Sunday, China successfully launched its eighth orbiter of the Beidou system.
sentences.chinese: 周日清晨，中国成功发射第八颗北斗导航卫星。

definition: BeiDou Navigation Satellite System (BDS) (similar to GPS)
pinyin: Bei3 Dou3 Wei4 xing1 Dao3 hang2 Xi4 tong3
wei4 xing1 dao3 hang2 xi4 tong3

definition: Globalnaya Navigatsionaya Satelinaya Sistema or Global Navigation Satellite System (GLONASS), the Russian equivalent of GPS/abbr. to 格洛納斯|格洛纳斯
pinyin: quan2 qiu2 wei4 xing1 dao3 hang2 xi4 tong3

definition: delta Ursae Majoris in the Big Dipper
GLONASS (Globalnaya Navigatsionaya Satelitnaya Sistema or Global Navigation Satellite System), the Russian equivalent of GPS

pinyin: wei4 xing1 ding4 wei4 xi4 tong3

definition: Qixing district of Guilin city 桂林市[Gui4 lin2 shi4], Guangxi
constellation (arch., now 星座)/one of the 28 constellations of traditional Chinese astronomy and astrology/motion of stars since one's birth (predetermining one's fate in astrology)
